name: Balloon Strike
developer: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
description: Balloon Strike is amazing Balloon Strike game in which you have bow and arrow to hit balloon and get score.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later required Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or Later Processor: Intel Core i3 515 7U Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card Storage: 500 MB available space
